The blazon of papistes Segar, William, Sir, d. 1633.
[30] p.
Imprinted by Thomas Purfoote, and are to be sold at his shoppe without Newgate, [London] : [1587]
Dedication signed: William Segar. Publication date from STC. In verse. A1 blank except for signature. Signatures: A-D⁴ (-D4, blank?). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
